Module jGame
Package jGame.core.entity

Class EntityImpl

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.entity.Entity
jGame.core.entity.EntityImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class EntityImpl
extends Entity
Basic implementation of a square entity that is controlled by the player using the WASD keys.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • EntityImpl

      protected EntityImpl()

    • EntityImpl

      public EntityImpl​(int startingX, int startingY, int width, int height)
      Creates an EntityImpl object in the given x and y coordinates and with the given width and height dimensions.
      Parameters:
      startingX - the initial horizontal position of this entity
      startingY - the initial vertical position of this entity
      width - the width of this entity
      height - the height of this entity
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • EntityImpl

      public EntityImpl​(int startingX, int startingY, Sprite texture)
      Creates an EntityImpl object in the given x and y coordinates and with the given sprite object to be rendered.
      Parameters:
      startingX - the initial horizontal position of this entity
      startingY - the initial vertical position of this entity
      texture - the sprite to render as the entity
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • EntityImpl

      public EntityImpl​(int startingX, int startingY, int width, int height, int speed)
      Creates an EntityImpl object in the given x and y coordinates and with the given width and height dimensions. Also sets the speed of this entity.
      Parameters:
      startingX - the initial horizontal position of this entity
      startingY - the initial vertical position of this entity
      width - the width of this entity
      height - the height of this entity
      speed - the given speed of this entity
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • EntityImpl

      public EntityImpl​(int startingX, int startingY, Sprite texture, int speed)
      Creates an EntityImpl object in the given x and y coordinates and with the given sprite object to be rendered. Also sets the speed of this entity.
      Parameters:
      startingX - the initial horizontal position of this entity
      startingY - the initial vertical position of this entity
      texture - the sprite to render as the entity
      speed - the given speed of this entity
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Updates the entity and readies it for rendering. Also, all CollisionListeners registered are notified if a collision happens.
      Specified by:
      tick in class Entity
      See Also:
      CollisionListener

      See Also:

    • isRenderable

      public boolean isRenderable()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Checks if the entity is currently renderable. This method is only intended to be used by the EntityManager.
      Specified by:
      isRenderable in class Entity
      Returns:
      weather this Entity is currently renderable or not

    • restart

      public void restart()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Restarts the player inside the game. Implementation is dependent on the client.
      Specified by:
      restart in class Entity
